attributes.action: Proclaim St. Georges Day an English Bank Holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St. George is Englands patron saint and the 23rd April, St. Georges Day, should be remembered and celebrated accordingly.  We should be promoting our identity and teaching the children of today (our future) to understand their history and the reasons behind it.  The Americans (July 4th - American Independance Day) and the Irish (17th March - St. Patricks Day) recognise the importance of these days and do exactly that.  We SHOULD be doing the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
